name: Zenith Into Maronarium
description:
Zenith Into Maronarium is hybrid arcade game that includes scroll-shooting, 2d platforming and 3d exploration missions.

The Plot:

As samozbor menace engulfs the Earth you escape on your faithful Kotel One aircraft. Your last mission is to survive. Can you find winged doom and make it to serve you?

Game contains:

  • Challenging general gameplay
  • 13 stages divided in 3 episodes
  • Creepy atmosphere of the ancient videogames
  • Hard bosses
  • No hope
